description: The value of the associated Legendre Polynomial of index n and order 1 evaluated at x=2^(-1/2) multiplied by 2^(3*n/2-1).
comments: Conjecture: (-n+1)*a(n) +2*(2*n-1)*a(n-1) -8*n*a(n-2)=0. - _R. J. Mathar_, Feb 05 2013This recurrence follows from the contiguous relation that relates the three Legendre Polynomials of the same order. _Wouter Meeussen_, Feb 06 2013
author: _Wouter Meeussen_
